data.eml:eml: Addition to the study of the genus Dusona (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Campopleginae) in Korea with description of a new species and key to the Korean species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Choi, Jin-Kyung, Lee, Jong-Wook (2014): Addition to the study of the genus Dusona (Hymenoptera, Ichneumonidae, Campopleginae) in Korea with description of a new species and key to the Korean species. ZooKeys 424: 59-89, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.424.7546, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.424.7546
